content: Was looking around the websites of the Atlanta and Cleveland Federal Reserve Banks and came across these two gems. The first does conclude that the NAFTA nations are probably not ready yet, but the report definitely leans toward making the Amero a real goal. The second is a trend analysis that also talks about the Amero. ---http://www.frbatlanta.org/filelegacydocs/ACF10B1.pdf ---http://www.clevelandfed.org/research/Trends/2002/0902/forcen.pdf

title: For those that thought the Amero was just a conspiracy theory.

content: I don't get fears about a NAU (even though it will never come to pass). Do you live in some imaginary world in which the US would not dominate any other members of the union economically, culturally, and militarily?
